ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You have known the first formation, so will you not pay heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You have known the first creation, then why do you not reflect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You are well aware of the first creation; then, do you learn no lesson from it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You certainly knew about (your) first development. Why do you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you have indeed learnt about the first creation, so why do you not ponder?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed, you have already known the first form of creation, why then do you not remember
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly you know the first growth, why do you not then mind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: You have known the first growth; so why will you not remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily ye know the first creation. Why, then, do ye not reflect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You have certainly known the first creation. Why, then, do you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly ye have fully known the first Production Wherefore heed ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly you have known the first genesis, then why do you not take admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And ye certainly know already the first form of creation: why then do ye not celebrate His praises?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed, you have already known the first form of creation (i.e. the creation of Adam), why then do you not remember or take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You have surely known of the first creation. Why then, will you not remember!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have known the first formation; if only you would remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:62] For verily you have known the first creation (al-nashā’ata: a variant reading has al-nash’ata), why then will you not remember? (tadhakkarūna: the original second tā’ [of tatadhakkarūna] has been assimilated with the dhāl).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily ye know) O people of Mecca (the first creation) in the wombs of mothers; and it is also said: the creation of Adam. (Why, then, do ye not reflect) upon the first creation and thus believe in the second creation?
